name: Beauty in Despair
description:
Horror Fact #04

Being a beautifull person is sometimes feel like a torture. People will die, kill, for you. Beautiful feature distracts people to have the sense of ownership, a forced belonging.  We can't be one and caring for ourselves. People get envy because we were born like this, becoming beautifull with a less effort. They thought we attract many things, easily, they thought it's nice but actually it's not. We are too easy to attract things and it's not good. Could you imagine when a magnet man attract knife? yes, it's destroy us.
